title: 0 lp anxiety
body: For some reason i feel really scared and uncomfortable at 0 lp. XD i dont know why but i need "safety lp" to feel safe, any number but 0. if only we could get 1 lp after a promotion because im really fucking scared looking at my rank like that, lol

replies.body: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ssUKlkgzMBU - Foxdrop has some ideas on how to counter this, give him a look, might help you overcome it
Then you learn not to even think about rank and what level it is, and focus on improving your gameplay. No more anxiety and less bad play.
Because theres an 90% chance youre about to get trolls

then you wouldnt be safe from a lose lose would you.

it just takes the 0 lp safety from win lose lose demotion to just lose lose demotion
